sentence.Network_en: 300 tons of Peruvian mangoes were kept from entering France.
sentence.Network_cn: 300吨秘鲁芒果被禁止进入法国。

sentence.Network_en: The Peruvian will run for him, and l'll pick my runner.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个秘鲁人会帮他跑, 而我要选自己的参赛者.

sentence.Network_en: Couples are breaking up a four - thousand - year - old Peruvian vase shipped UPS.
sentence.Network_cn: 夫妻感情的破裂,就象 四千年 的秘鲁古瓷花瓶被UPS快递后的结果,无法弥合.

entry.def: Peruvian means belonging or related to Peru, or to its people or culture.

example.ex: ...the high, fertile valleys of the Peruvian Andes.
example.tran: 秘鲁安第斯山脉富饶肥沃、海拔甚高的山谷

means.word_mean: 1. a native or inhabitant of Peru
1. of or relating to or characteristic of Peru or its people;
